Package com.dimasDermawanJBusIO

Class Account

java.lang.Object
com.dimasDermawanJBusIO.dbjson.Serializable
com.dimasDermawanJBusIO.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Serializable>
public class Account extends Serializable

Represents a user account with essential information like name, email, and password. This class extends the Serializable class, ensuring unique IDs for each instance.


The account includes additional details such as the associated company (Renter), account balance, and validation methods for email and password.

Author:
Dimas Dermawan
